DPRD dan Pemprov Jabar Sepakat Lanjutkan Seleksi Komisioner Komisi Informasi
07 Nov 2019, 23:00 by Advertorial
DPRD Provinsi Jawa Barat sepakat untuk melanjutkan seleksi Komisioner Komisi Informasi Provinsi (KIP) Jawa Barat. Ketua Komisi I DPRD Provinsi Jawa Barat Bedi Budiman mengatakan hasil rapat Badan Musyawarah menetapkan seleksi Komisioner KIP Jawa Barat akan dilaksanakan pada Jum’at 15 November 2019.
“Komisi I ingin tepat waktu dan sesuai dengan jadwal tersebut, oleh karena itu secara resmi kami mengumumkan bahwa pelaksanaan fit and proper test Komisi Informasi dilaksanakan pada hari Jum’at 15 November 2019”, ujar Bedi saat meninjau ruang Humas Sekretariat DPRD Provinsi Jawa Barat Kamis, 7 Nopember 2019.
Komisi I, lanjut Bedi, telah melakukan berbagai persiapan pelaksanaan seleksi Komisioner KIP Jawa Barat seperti mempelajari visi dan misi para calon serta mengatur mekanisme pelaksanaan fit and proper test tersebut yang diupayakan terbuka. 



 
“Kita akan mengupayakan se-terbuka mungkin pelaksanaan seleksi ini, dan akan mengundang para pihak”, tegas Bedi.
Kriteria Komisioner KIP Jawa Barat menurut Bedi harus memiliki Kapabilitas dan Leadership serta memiliki orientasi Komisi Informasi kedepan misalkan informasi yang disalahgunakan atau informasi yang disesatkan. Para komisioner kedepan itu harus memiliki kemampuan, sense of crisis terhadap itu”, pinta Bedi.
Selain informasi yang dikecualikan dan memang tidak boleh dipublikasikan seperti diatur oleh undang – undang Keterbukaan Informasi Publik, kepada para Komisioner KIP Jawa Barat terpilih nantinya, Bedi menegaskan sistem klasifikasi informasi publik harus lebih diperjelas lagi. Sehingga memudahkan masyarakat untuk mengakses informasi publik.
“Misalnya informasi tersebut terbuka betul untuk publik (Setiap Saat, Serta Merta & Berkala), informasi terbatas untuk kalangan tertentu atau memang informasi tersebut berdurasi bisa dibuka dalam rentang waktu,” ucap Bedi.
Lebih lanjut Bedi menyatakan bahwa hasil fit and proper test Komisioner KIP Jawa Barat yang dilakukan Komisi I akan langsung diumumkan setelah proses fit and proper test selesai.***

DPRD and West Java Provincial Government Agree to Continue Selection of Information Commission Commissioner
Nov 7 2019, 23:00 by Advertorial
West Java Provincial DPRD agreed to continue selection of West Java Provincial Information Commission (KIP). Chairperson of Commission I of the West Java Provincial Parliament Bedi Budiman said the results of a meeting of the Deliberation Board determined that the selection of the West Java KIP Commissioner would be held on Friday 15 November 2019.
"Commission I wants to be on time and according to the schedule, therefore we officially announce that the implementation of the Information Commission fit and proper test will be held on Friday 15 November 2019," Bedi said while reviewing the public relations room at the West Java Provincial DPRD Secretariat Thursday , November 7, 2019.
Commission I, continued Bedi, had made various preparations for the implementation of the West Java KIP Commissioner selection such as studying the vision and mission of the candidates as well as regulating the mechanism of the implementation of the fit and proper test that was pursued openly.




"We will make the selection as open as possible as possible, and will invite the parties," said Bedi.
Criteria for the West Java KIP Commissioner according to Bedi must have Capability and Leadership as well as having an Information Commission orientation going forward eg misused information or misleading information. "The commissioners in the future must have the ability, sense of crisis towards it," pleaded Bedi.
In addition to information that is excluded and indeed may not be published as regulated by the Public Information Openness Act, to the elected West Java KIP Commissioners later, Bedi emphasized that the system of classification of public information must be clarified even more. Making it easier for people to access public information.
"For example, the information is open to the public (at any time, as well as Merta & Periodic), limited information for certain circles or indeed the information can be opened in a span of time," said Bedi.
Bedi further stated that the results of the West Java KIP Commissioner fit and proper test conducted by Commission I will be immediately announced after the fit and proper test process is completed. ***
